channel.title: How do I make it so people can Play
channel.description:
Like, I have all the things down pack. It's working and such. But, do I upload ALL the files? Like the compile and everything for people to play on it? or do I delete some files? :/
Im confused please help. I want it so people can download the server and play.

item.title: How do I make it so people can Play
item.dc:creator: @ravens ravens
item.description:
@ravens wrote:

[quote=“Joshooa, post:6, topic:399183”]But, my client folder has the compile + all the client.java and such.
Don’t i need to delete that? :/[/quote]
it will make the client smaller which is always a good thing, when you have backed up a version of your client use this batch file to delete the java files in your client. [shadow=red,left]REMEMBER BACK IT UP FIRST![/shadow]

@echo off del "./*.java pause

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make it so people can Play

item.title: How do I make it so people can Play
item.dc:creator: @Mi_K_ey Mi K ey
item.description:
@Mi_K_ey wrote:

Yes. VPS - Virtual Private Server. You can buy that to have someone Automatically keep something open and for no lagg.

Oh, alrighty!
Is that what a VPS is for? so you can run it without worrying about the black server box?

item.title: How do I make it so people can Play
item.dc:creator: @Mi_K_ey Mi K ey
item.description:
@Mi_K_ey wrote:

No you don’t, just make the Client into a .rar file, then upload it to a site, then release the Link

item.title: How do I make it so people can Play
item.dc:creator: @Joshooa Joshooa
item.description:
@Joshooa wrote:

[quote=“Mi K ey, post:3, topic:399183”]Change your IP on your Client if haven’t been done. Then simply Upload the CLIENT to any of these sites:

MediaFire

MediaFire

MediaFire is a simple to use free service that lets you put all your photos, documents, music, and video in a single place so you can access them anywhere and share them everywhere.


http://www.uppit.com[/quote]
I know, but in the files of the server do I need to delete compile or anything? so the people can’t edit it? ;/

Read full topic

http://www.uppit.com

item.title: How do I make it so people can Play
item.dc:creator: @ravens ravens
item.description:
@ravens wrote:

if you have portforwarded and you have a static IP, change the client IP to your static IP (no-ip) address and compile, and optionally jar the contents or your client into a .jar file and upload it to make a webclient
otherwise just search portforward or no-ip in here or google.

Read full topic
